messages.message:
hmm this is weird, here is the error message from `celery-app-tasks`:

```2024-10-07T02:01:57.021575613Z stdout F [2024-10-07 02:01:57,021] [ForkPoolWorker-46/MainThread] {/instabase/workers/celery-app-tasks/py/instabase/solution_utils/deployed_solution_util.py:163} ERROR - [trace_id=de51b93e1f812adb] - User: support-testing.org-user-e_instabase.com (http://support-testing.org-user-e_instabase.com) - Failed to delete deployed solution from database with error : Error occurred executing GRPC method: Request /repo_service.RepoService/DeleteDeployedSolution failed. Error code=INTERNAL, Error=(13, 'internal'), Message: Solution could not be deleted. Non-retriable error```
@daniel @pauline.comising do you know what this might be, some db invariant issue?

I can repro on `aihub-sandbox-internal` where I can’t delete an app with an associated ground truth dataset and accuracy test

for now I’ve made a PR to skip the test in CI to prevent slowing down other tests further https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/63519

Ah yep found the cps logs, and while a `ground_truth_set` table entry has a cascade rule for deleting deployed solution, `ground_truth_runs` and `accuracy_report_runs` do not have `on_delete` rules, causing this failure. We'll make a ticket for this and @daniel we can discuss all the deletion logic/rules we want for everything ground truth set related in our backend sync :woman-bowing::skin-tone-2:
